ElementGetAnimations.summary:
The getAnimations() method of the interface
(specified on the Animatable mixin) returns an array of all
objects affecting this element or which are scheduled to do so
in future. It can optionally return objects for descendant
elements too.

blockquote.para: Note: This array includes CSS Animations, CSS Transitions, and Web Animations.

remarks.para:
-Web Animations API
-CSS Animations
-CSS Transitions
- - Fetch all animations in the document
-

ElementGetAnimations.returns:
An {{jsxref("Array")}} of objects, each representing an
animation currently targeting the on which this method is called,
or one of its descendant elements if { subtree: true } is specified.
